# Overall evaluation

<br>
 

<br>

##  Scores overview 
 

|               | RMSE | RMSE score | Effective res. |
|---------------|------|------------|----------------|
|DUACS (all sat)|0.046 |0.63        |103.0 km        |
|MIOST          |0.041 |0.55        |121.3 km        |
